name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色すーぱーみらくる☆どり〜む♪【#湊あくあ3Dライブ 】 [gf7RSwmp8dM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua performs the finale of her original song 'Kira Kira Romantic'.
Instrumental transition with audience applause. Title card for the next song appears.
Minato Aqua performs a cover of 'Renai Circulation'.

subtitles.original: ...たり心の
subtitles.english: ...break the door of my heart.

subtitles.original: 扉を壊してよ
subtitles.english: Break down the door to my heart.

subtitles.original: 大切なことは目を見て
subtitles.english: Look me in the eye when you say...

subtitles.original: 言って
subtitles.english: ...the things that matter.

subtitles.original: あなたとならばこの街を
subtitles.english: If I'm with you, I can escape...

subtitles.original: 抜け出せる
subtitles.english: ...this city.

subtitles.original: 今すぐ連れ出して My Sweet Darling
subtitles.english: Take me away right now, my sweet darling.

subtitles.original: 恋愛サーキュレーション
subtitles.english: Renai Circulation

subtitles.original: せーのっ！
subtitles.english: One, two!

subtitles.original: でもそんなんじゃだめ
subtitles.english: But that's not good enough.

subtitles.original: もうそんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, that's just not gonna work.

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよもっともっと
subtitles.english: My heart will keep evolving, more and more.

subtitles.original: 言葉にすれば消えちゃう関係なら
subtitles.english: If this is a relationship that'll vanish if voiced,

subtitles.original: 言葉を消せばいいやって
subtitles.english: then I'll just have to erase the words.

subtitles.original: 思ってた 恐れてた
subtitles.english: That's what I thought, and what I feared.

subtitles.original: だけどあれ？なんか違うかも
subtitles.english: But wait, maybe it's something different?

subtitles.original: 千里の道も一歩から
subtitles.english: A journey of a thousand miles starts with one step.

subtitles.original: 石のように固いそんな意志で
subtitles.english: With a will as firm as a stone,

subtitles.original: ちりも積もれば大和撫子
subtitles.english: dust piles up to become a Yamato Nadeshiko.

subtitles.original: 死ぬ気で いや、死ぬ気で！
subtitles.english: I'll give it my all! No, I'll put my life on the line!

subtitles.original: ふわふわり ふわふわる
subtitles.english: Soft and light, floating and bright.

subtitles.original: あなたが名前を呼ぶそれだけで宙に浮ぶ
subtitles.english: Just hearing you call my name makes me float in the air.

subtitles.original: ふわふわる ふわふわり
subtitles.english: Floating and bright, soft and light.

subtitles.original: あなたが笑っているそれだけで笑顔になる
subtitles.english: Just seeing you smile makes me smile too.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you, God,

subtitles.original: 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: even if it was a prank of fate,

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが
subtitles.english: getting to meet you...

subtitles.original: しあわせなの
subtitles.english: ...makes me so happy.

subtitles.original: でもそんなんじゃだめ
subtitles.english: But that's not good enough.

subtitles.original: もうそんなんじゃほら
subtitles.english: Look, that's just not gonna work.

subtitles.original: 心は進化するよもっともっと
subtitles.english: My heart will keep evolving, more and more.

subtitles.original: そうそんなんじゃやだ
subtitles.english: No, I don't want it like that.

subtitles.original: ねぇそんなんじゃまだ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's not enough yet.

subtitles.original: 私のこと見ててね ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: Please keep watching me, forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 私の中のあなたほど
subtitles.english: Compared to how much you mean to me,

subtitles.original: あなたの中の私の存在は
subtitles.english: my existence within you...

subtitles.original: まだまだ大きくないこともわかってるけれど
subtitles.english: ...isn't that big yet, I know that, but...

subtitles.original: 今この同じ瞬間
subtitles.english: The fact that we're sharing...

subtitles.original: 共有してる実感
subtitles.english: ...this same moment right now,

subtitles.original: ちりも積もれば大和撫子
subtitles.english: dust piles up to become a Yamato Nadeshiko.

subtitles.original: 略してちりつも大和撫子！
subtitles.english: In short, Chi-ri-tsu-mo Yamato Nadeshiko!

subtitles.original: くらくらり くらくらる
subtitles.english: Dizzy and dazed, head in a haze.

subtitles.original: あなたを見上げたらそれだけでまぶしすぎて
subtitles.english: Just looking up at you, you're so blindingly bright.

subtitles.original: くらくらる くらくらり
subtitles.english: Head in a haze, dizzy and dazed.

subtitles.original: あなたを想っているそれだけで溶けてしまう
subtitles.english: Just thinking about you makes me melt away.

subtitles.original: 神様ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you, God,

subtitles.original: 運命のいたずらでも
subtitles.english: even if it was a prank of fate,

subtitles.original: めぐり逢えたことが
subtitles.english: getting to meet you...

subtitles.original: しあわせなの
subtitles.english: ...makes me so happy.

subtitles.original: 恋する季節は欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The season of love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちは欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The feeling of love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちは欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The feeling of love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちは欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The feeling of love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する瞳は欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The eyes in love are a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する瞳は欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The eyes in love are a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する乙女は欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The girl in love is a greedy circulation.

subtitles.original: 恋する乙女は欲張りサーキュレーション
subtitles.english: The girl in love is a greedy circulation.
